installation.Wordpress installation instructions:
Log in to your WordPress account and go to Dashboard
                      Navigate to the ‚ÄúPlugins‚Äù section and select ‚ÄúAdd New‚Äù.
                      Type ‚ÄúeChat‚Äù in the search bar and hit the ‚ÄúInstall New‚Äù button
                      Once installed, make sure to hit the ‚ÄúActivate‚Äù button before moving on
                      Click ‚ÄúeChat Chat‚Äù in the left-hand side menu. Choose ‚ÄúLog in‚Äù and enter your email and password
                      Choose the project you want to integrate with your website
                      You‚Äôre all set! Hit ‚ÄúOpen eChat Panel‚Äù to start using live chat & chatbots

Ticketing.Keep sending tickets from Tidio domain o: Keep sending tickets from Tidio domain or start using your own email address to improve your credibility and increase the deliverability.

Ticketing.You can connect your existing mailbox or: You can connect your existing mailbox or create a new one with a eChat domain.

Ticketing.List of filtered out emails from which y: List of filtered out emails from which you won‚Äôt receive any tickets.

google.Select the Gear icon from the top right: Select the Gear icon from the top right corner of your Google mail dashboard and choose Settings
google.Choose the 'Forwarding and POP/IMAP' tab: Choose the "Forwarding and POP/IMAP" tab in the settings and click on the "Add a forwarding address" button in the middle
google.Copy the following email address and pas: Copy the following email address and paste it in the 'Please enter a new forwarding email address:' field and click on the 'Next button'
google.Please wait for a confirmation email and: Please wait for a confirmation email and click on the Verification link to activate the forwarding. Also, make sure that you have selected the 'Forward a copy of incoming mail to...' checkbox in your Forwarding settings in Gmail

microsoft.Select the Gear icon from the top right: Select the Gear icon from the top right corner of your Inbox and choose 'Options'
microsoft.From the Options page, click on 'Forward: Select the Gear icon from the top right corner of your Inbox and choose 'Options'
microsoft.Copy the following email address and pas: Copy the following email address and paste it in the 'Forward my email to:' field and click on the 'Save' button

other.To integrate your mailbox, set up automa: To integrate your mailbox, set up automatic forwarding in your current email, to the email address below
other.click here to read the webmail integrati: click here to read the webmail integration guides

customerSatisfaction.If you want to measure the level of your: If you want to measure the level of your customer satisfaction, you can enable an automated survey that allows them to rate and comment on their experience. It will be shown whenever an operator closes a conversation. You will be able to check results in the Analytics section.
customerSatisfaction.A customer can rate and comment on a con: A customer can rate and comment on a conversation by clicking on the three dots icon even though an automated survey is disabled.
customerSatisfaction.How would you rate your experience talki: How would you rate your experience talking to us today?
customerSatisfaction.Share your feedback for this rating: Share your feedback for this rating
